name: It happens in June.
description:
What happens in June, stays in June.

His hallucinations can support that quote: despite hearing voices and seeing people that aren't supposed to be real, he can live like any other 'normal' people.

Until the murders start to happen, and every single evidence points towards him as the most likely culprit.

This is the story of a young man named June Martel, and who the <redacted> is trying to frame him for all these <redacted><redacted> crimes!?

---

Written by Kowara with Inky for inkJam 2018. The theme is 'It's not what you think'.

This is not a full version of the whole story, but hopefully it'll be developed further. Much, much further.
